juding_criteria:
Here is a bullet list of required concrete visual elements:

*   Facial features of the person in the first image
*   Body shape of the person in the first image
*   White polo shirt with small dark logo (from the second image)
*   Dark pants (from the second image)
*   Pink hair color (from the third image)
*   Short, layered, messy hairstyle (from the third image)
